languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, Леди Орселлио уже некоторое время наблюдает с балкончика верхних палуб за происходящим на корабле. Подумала, вам... стоит знать. Простите за беспокойство".
"Lord Captain, Lady Orsellio has been standing on the upper deck balcony for some time now, staring at the activity down below. I thought... you should know. Please pardon the interruption."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, Леди Орселлио уже некоторое время наблюдает с балкончика верхних палуб за происходящим на корабле. Подумала, вам... стоит знать. Простите за беспокойство".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, Lady Orsellio has stood on the upper deck balcony for some time now, staring at the ship going about its daily life down below. I thought... you should know. Please pardon the interruption."

"Lord Captain, Lady Orsellio has stood on the upper deck balcony for some time now, staring at the ship going about its daily life down below. I thought... you should know. Please pardon the interruption."
"Lord Captain, Lady Orsellio has been standing on the upper deck balcony for some time now, staring at the activity down below. I thought... you should know. Please pardon the interruption."
"Lord Captain, Lady Orsellio has been standing on the upper deck balcony for some time now, staring at the activity down below. I thought... you should know. Please pardon the interruption."
"Lord Captain, Lady Orsellio has been standing on the upper deck balcony for some time now, staring at the activity down below. I thought... you should know. Please pardon the interruption."

languages.text: “舰长大人，奥赛罗女士一直站在上层甲板的露台上，呆呆地看着下面。我想……我想应该把这件事报告给您。请原谅我的冒昧。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, Lady Orsellio has been standing on the upper deck balcony for some time now, staring at the activity down below. I thought... you should know. Please pardon the interruption."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，奥塞罗女士一直站在上层甲板的露台上，呆呆地看着下面。我想……我想应该把这件事报告给您。请原谅我的冒昧。”

languages.text: "Lord Captain, Lady Orsellio steht nun schon seit geraumer Zeit auf dem Balkon des Oberdecks und starrt auf die Aktivitäten darunter. Ich dachte ... Ihr solltet das wissen. Bitte verzeiht die Störung."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, Lady Orsellio has been standing on the upper deck balcony for some time now, staring at the activity down below. I thought... you should know. Please pardon the interruption."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, Lady Orsellio steht nun schon seit geraumer Zeit auf dem Balkon des Oberdecks und starrt auf die Aktivitäten darunter. Ich dachte ... Ihr solltet das wissen. Bitte verzeiht die Störung."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, dame Orsellio se trouve sur le balcon du pont supérieur depuis un moment, à observer l'activité en contrebas. Je me suis dit que... vous devriez le savoir. Veuillez me pardonner cette interruption. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, Lady Orsellio has been standing on the upper deck balcony for some time now, staring at the activity down below. I thought... you should know. Please pardon the interruption."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, dame Orsellio se trouve sur le balcon du pont supérieur depuis un moment, à observer l'activité en contrebas. Je me suis dit que... vous devriez le savoir. Veuillez me pardonner cette interruption. »

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, lady Orsellio lleva un tiempo de pie en el balcón de la cubierta superior, observando la actividad de abajo. Pensé... que debería saberlo. Por favor, perdone la interrupción».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, Lady Orsellio has been standing on the upper deck balcony for some time now, staring at the activity down below. I thought... you should know. Please pardon the interruption."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, lady Orsellio lleva un tiempo de pie en el balcón de la cubierta superior, observando la actividad de abajo. Pensé... que debería saberlo. Por favor, perdone la interrupción».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、レディ・オーセリオがしばらくの間上甲板のバルコニーに立って、下で行われている活動をご覧になっています。ロード・キャプテンに…お伝えしておこうと思いまして。お邪魔して申し訳ございません」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, Lady Orsellio has been standing on the upper deck balcony for some time now, staring at the activity down below. I thought... you should know. Please pardon the interruption."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、レディ・オーセリオがしばらくの間上甲板のバルコニーに立って、下で行われている活動をご覧になっています。ロード・キャプテンに…お伝えしておこうと思いまして。お邪魔して申し訳ございません」

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan. Leydi Orsellio, epey bir süredir güverte balkonunda durup aşağıyı seyrediyor. Bilmek isteyeceğinizi... Düşündüm. Rahatsız ettim, kusura bakmayın."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, Lady Orsellio has been standing on the upper deck balcony for some time now, staring at the activity down below. I thought... you should know. Please pardon the interruption."
